pages.caption: The Sacred Letter — Postmarked 1945. A love letter, glowing faintly.
Taken — A supernatural gust snatches the letter into the floor vent.
Postal Purgatory — Millions of undelivered letters line the descent.
The Paper Golems — Archivists of compacted mail, sorting for eternity.
VIOLATION — Empty hands. No mail to deliver. The golem rises.
The Chase — Running through canyons of dead mail as golems lumber.
The Trade — 'My letter... for yours... please.'
Benjamin Franklin, Postmaster General — The first. The ghost. The legend.
The Golden Arrow Key — Nec Temere Nec Timide. Opens ALL locks.
The Surface — Finally out. The light. Barb waits with coffee.
Neither rain, nor snow, nor eighty years.
